page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: In June 1985 in our block there were {70 people living here permanently.}The majority of them are retired.Families rarely move into this area perhaps as there are few employment opportunities to attract any young families to move here. Several men are employed by { {Highland Regional Council}on road maintenance. Some others carry out building repairs,fencing, or part-time work at the nearby fishing port of {Lochinver.}We have a district nurse living and working in this area. The majority of residents are involved in{crofting.}However only a handful of people make their living from crofting. Despite Government aid (subsidies, grants etc.,) most people are only part-time crofters keeping a few sheep, cows, pigs and hens.
